variable.label: Fully-Qualified Host Name
variable.name: Kickstart_PublicHostname
variable.help: This must be the fully-qualified domain name (required).

variable.label: Certificate Organization
variable.name: Info_CertificateOrganization
variable.help: The name of your organization. Used when building a certificate for this host (optional).

variable.label: Contact
variable.name: Info_ClusterContact
variable.help: Email address for the cluster admin (optional).

variable.label: URL
variable.name: Info_ClusterURL
variable.help: URL for this cluster or for the project it supports (optional).

variable.label: Latitude/Longitude
variable.name: Info_ClusterLatlong
variable.help: The physical location of this cluster (optional).
